query.statement: SELECT A.EHR_CODE AS HR_CD , A.EHR_NM AS NAME , B.STD_CD , DECODE(B.STD_CD, NULL, '', 'S') FLAG , 'JG' CD_CLASS FROM HLDC_EHR_CODE_CONV A , MAC_HR_MAP B WHERE A.GUBUN = 'CONV직급' AND B.CD_CLASS(+) = 'JG' AND A.EHR_CODE = B.HR_CD(+) GROUP BY A.EHR_CODE, A.EHR_NM, B.STD_CD UNION SELECT HR_CD, '잡급' AS NAME, STD_CD, DECODE(STD_CD, NULL, '', 'S') FLAG, CD_CLASS FROM MAC_HR_MAP WHERE HR_CD = 'ZZZZ' -- ORDER BY A.EHR_CODE, B.STD_CD
